    • Method Detail

      • listGenerationsForInstance

        public static List<String> listGenerationsForInstance(String instanceDir)
                                               throws IOException
        Lists all generation keys for a given instance. The results are ordered by recency -- most recent generation is last. Note that this not in every case the same as lexicographic ordering, although almost always is. It will not in the case of generation number "wrapping around": 00000,99998,99999 will be returned as 99998,99999,00000.
        Parameters:
        instanceDir - instance directory from which to retrieve generations for
        Returns:
        locations of all generation directories for the given instance
        Throws:
        IOException

      • orderGenerations

        public static List<String> orderGenerations(List<String> generations)
                                     throws IOException
        Parameters:
        generations - lexicographically ordered list of generations
        Returns:
        generations ordered by creation -- accounts for the case of 00000,99998,99999 where 00000 is most recent
        Throws:
        IOException

      • parseGenerationFromPrefix

        public static int parseGenerationFromPrefix(CharSequence prefix)
